sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Add cascade delete to Relevant Doc Detail table: cxs_rel_doc_detail</description>
        <name>Add cascade delete to Rel Doc Detail</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'cxs_rel_doc_detail');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'cxs_relevant_doc');
	gr.addNullQuery('reference_cascade_rule');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', 'delete');
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.update();
	}
    return;
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-18 13:30:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>276bed19b7122110d3ebf2b1de11a96a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add cascade delete to Rel Doc Detail</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Contextual Search" source="com.snc.contextual_search">67c7786c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_276bed19b7122110d3ebf2b1de11a96a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-18 14:12:50</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
